name: Absalom
effect: [On K.O.] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your trash rested.
